name: Playground Battle World
description:
In Playground Battle World there will be no more than 16 players in each room. And although the battle royale start point is the same, the games are much faster and more dynamic with only 16 cartoon themed players must survive. Player will be deployed on the city and he will have to think a good strategy and use his hability to not die. Loot weapons and drive vehicles, choices are endless in Playground Battle World. Watch out for other players and the doomed dome, because it will kill you.


Free to Play or Pay to Win?
Playground Battle World is a free to play and you do not have to pay to win. In addition, players who opted for the free version had all the functions of the game concentrated on a single map. With that being said, we have something for the most ambitious players. A premium version will be available at launch. This premium edition includes all the content of the F2P version, obviously, plus a package map that includes several battle scenarios and vehicles.

Cartoon aesthetics
The result of combining cel shading and cartoon results in Playground Battle World. A very attractive and fun aesthetic, but without forgetting the seriousness of the PvP combat.

Vehicles
Premium players will have the opportunity to drive pick-ups, sport car, vans… and even a plane! Yes, there is a plane with his own landing track.

Weapons
In the map will be other weapons, be the first to get the best and kill all your enemies.

Doomed dome
Nobody knows why, but in this city there is a mysterious dome that it closes to some zone. Everything that is outside the dome ends up dying. Maybe it’s the aliens?

And… is that all?
NO! All those who obtained the premium version will continue to receive new maps in the future without having to pay more money.
